AzureBlade's spark seemed to grow for a moment, expanding and 
reaching enormous proportion... then it seemed to come back to 
normal, returning to a vivid blue color.

It all ceased as abruptly as it had started. The Survivor Warrior was 
still offline, though.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> OOC: No, well, yes, sort of, He, Denzabar, shares his spark with a 
council 
> member, or elder, ( Forgive me, I forget their names) And can 
freely enter the 
> matrix to help heal or find sparks. The fact he sharesa a spark is 
known, but 
> the exact reason isn't known yet, also right now his memory is sort 
of 
> rebooting, so, random images may pop up as well.
> 
> BIC: "Calm down? How?" Denzabar said, still lifeless but voice. He 
stopped 
> talking for a few...."Ok, This is a Predacon program, how do I know 
> that...Embrace the program, don't delete it."
